none.label: No Final Round
none.description: Group stage only, placement by table
none.explanation: Recommended for very limited time or pure tournament days

finalOnly.label: Final Only
finalOnly.description4g: Best 2 group winners directly in final
finalOnly.explanation2g: Too few final matches, second places don't play for 3rd
finalOnly.explanation3g: Too few final matches, unfair due to bye issues
finalOnly.explanation4g: Too few final matches for 4 groups
finalOnly.explanation5to7g: Too few final matches for many groups
finalOnly.explanation8g: Far too few final matches for this many groups

top4.explanation2g: Standard for 2 groups - fair and clear
top4.explanation3g: Sensible for 3 groups - best group winner gets bye
top4.explanation4g: Shorter variant - good when time is limited
top4.explanation8g: Very short variant - only the absolute best teams

top8.description4g: Top 2 per group → Quarterfinals → Semifinals → Final
top8.explanation5to7g: Standard for large tournaments - proven structure
top8.explanation8g: Shorter variant - good when time is limited

top16.label: Top 16 (with Round of 16)
top16.description: Best 16 teams → Round of 16 → Quarterfinals → Semifinals → Final
top16.explanation: Classic for 8+ groups - perfect symmetry for large tournaments

allPlaces.explanation2g: Every team has another final match - high participation
allPlaces.description3g: 6-team final round with intermediate groups or KO
allPlaces.explanation3g: Complex - two 3-team intermediate groups needed, much time required
allPlaces.description4g: All teams in final round - complete placements
allPlaces.explanation4g: Many matches - only realistic for all-day tournaments
allPlaces.description5to7g: Maximum number of teams in final round
allPlaces.explanation5to7g: Only sensible for very large, multi-day tournaments
allPlaces.description8g: Maximum number of teams in final round
allPlaces.explanation8g: Only realistic for multi-day large tournaments - very many matches

modeHint.organizerDescription: You bring your own referees (e.g., Ref1, Ref2).

organizerSettings.namesHint: Names will appear in the schedule instead of "Ref1", "Ref2", etc.

finalsMode.label: Referees in Final Phase
